title: NEED FOR SPEED SHIFT UNLEASHED 2 - GLOBE
description:
* Hi PC games fans ...


* Play the new Need For Speed game ...


Shift 2: Unleashed career mode is called\"entertaining and interactive\". Shift 2: Unleashed redefines the racing simulator genre by delivering authentic and true-to-life, dynamic crash physics, plus intricately detailed real-world cars, drivers and tracks. During their careers, virtual racers partake in a variety of motorsports ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½ like drifting, muscle car racing, retro car racing, Endurance races and circuit competition (i.e. FIA GT3 European Championship) ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½ to hone their driving skills in hopes of becoming the FIA GT1 world champion.
 
The gameÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s helmet-cam, which puts players right in the head of the racer, is more than just in in-car camera. The helmet cam moves with the head of the driver, being drawn from side to side as the car takes corners and the driver is hit by GÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s. As the car comes up to higher speeds, the edges of the screen will become blurred to simulate the tunnel-vision effect that drivers suffer when racing
